Package model

Class Offer

java.lang.Object
model.Offer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A class representing an offer, containing all the information needed.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group 8-SEP2
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Offer

      public Offer​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, double pricePerMonth, double deposit, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String type, double area, int floor, int numberOfRooms, User landlord)
      Ten-argument constructor.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the offer
      description - The description of the offer
      pricePerMonth - The price per month of the property
      deposit - The deposit to pay to rent the property
      location - The address of the property
      type - The type of property is being rented out
      area - The area of the property
      floor - The floor of the property
      numberOfRooms - The number of rooms of the property
      landlord - The landlord profile (User object)
